hunter.opener: What do you think of my fit? Cool isn’t it? I wear this to get closer to the deer so we don’t frighten them when we hunt!
hunter.request: Speaking of the hunt, we’re going out soon. Can you help me find some deer?
hunter.closer: Sweet, thanks! Here’s some berries from the manzanita bushes I just collected.
hunter.seal: A seal piece? Hm, I haven't heard of this seal thing, but I will keep an eye out it.

weaver.opener: Ugh, I’m so close to finishing this basket but I’m almost out of blue rye fibers!
weaver.request: Please find some for me so I can finish this faster. I will trade you with something really cool!
weaver.closer: Oh my goodness, you’re a life saver! I can definitely finish this basket now.
weaver.seal: The cool thing? I heard the chief found something in the forest today. No one knows what it is but it is quite shiny. It looks like a small part of something bigger.

gatherer.opener: Oh hey, no need to panic! These fires are 100% controlled. We’re just burning the land so new shoots grow and lure in game.
gatherer.request: You’re looking for some blue rye? You’re in luck! We just harvested this today. I’ll trade it for some clam shells.
gatherer.closer: I can’t believe you got 5 clam shells that quickly, impressive! Here’s the rye fibers, as promised.
gatherer.seal: I'm not sure what a seal is but I heard it was hard enough to smash open clams.

fisher.opener: Man, fishing sure is hard. I’m not used to this bone harpoon.
fisher.request: Maybe a net would work better? I saw some back in the village.
fisher.closer: Thanks for the help! I surely can catch some salmon now. Here, take some clam shells as my token of gratitude.
fisher.seal: The object? I heard it was made of a rare rock, something I’ve never seen before. The color looks a bit like wood or acorn…

builder.opener: Oh this? This is the village dance house! We are about to have our annual Kuksa to bring good health and bountiful hunt to our village.
builder.request: Would you please find me some more oak and grapevines? I need a few more supports.
builder.closer: Amazing, thank you! We can definitely finish this by sundown.
builder.seal: The chief? He’s inside here. I saw him holding something earlier. Could it be an offering from the earth itself bringing wealth to our village?
